scripts.win-rebuild-cmake: npm run win-clean && mkdir build && npm run build
scripts.lix-rebuild-cmake: npm run lix-clean && mkdir build && npm run build
scripts.tmp-win-debug: npm run win-rebuild-cmake && npm run build-binary && npm run test && .\dist\bin\FrankieTranspiler.exe --debug-parser-antlr-print-test .\..\debug.frankie
